TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeySpline extends System.Windows.Freezable implements class System.IFormattable
Public Class KeySpline Inherits Freezable Implements IFormattable
public ref class KeySpline : System::Windows::Freezable, IFormattable

summary.span: 這個類別可供曲線主要畫面格用來定義動畫進度。

span.span: This class is used by a spline key frame to define animation progress.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解如何運作方式，最好先了解三次方貝茲曲線。To understand how a works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves. 三次方貝茲曲線是由一個起始點、一個結束點和兩個控制點所定義。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points. 在兩個座標定義這些兩個控制點。The two coordinates in the defines those two control points. 描述關鍵 spline 貝茲曲線的開始點一律是 0，並結束點永遠為 1，這就是為什麼您只定義兩個控制點。When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points. 產生的曲線指定動畫如何插補期間的時間區段。也就是說，曲線代表時間區段中動畫的目標屬性變更的速率。The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment. 若要進一步了解貝茲曲線的動畫進度之間的關聯性，請參閱[金鑰曲線動畫範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值和是 (0，0) 和 (1，1) 分別具有動畫或索引鍵的畫面格進度的任何作用。The default values for and are (0,0) and (1,1) respectively, which has no effect on the progress of an animation or key frame.

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要建立目前物件的可修改複本，請呼叫而不是直接呼叫這個方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

summary.span: 用來定義描述 之貝茲曲線的第一個控制點。

span.span: The first control point used to define a Bezier curve that describes a .

value.span: 貝茲曲線的第一個控制點。

span.span: The Bezier curve's first control point.

value.span: 該點的 和 值必須介於 0 和 1 (含) 之間。

span.span: The point's and values must each be between 0 and 1, inclusive.
The default value is (0,0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解如何運作方式，最好先了解三次方貝茲曲線。To understand how a works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves. 三次方貝茲曲線是由一個起始點、一個結束點和兩個控制點所定義。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points. 在兩個座標定義這些兩個控制點。The two coordinates in the defines those two control points. 描述關鍵 spline 貝茲曲線的開始點一律是 0，並結束點永遠為 1，這就是為什麼您只定義兩個控制點。When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points. 產生的曲線指定動畫如何插補期間的時間區段。也就是說，曲線代表時間區段中動畫的目標屬性變更的速率。The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment. 若要進一步了解貝茲曲線的動畫進度之間的關聯性，請參閱[金鑰曲線動畫範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解如何運作方式，最好先了解三次方貝茲曲線。To understand how a works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves. 三次方貝茲曲線是由一個起始點、一個結束點和兩個控制點所定義。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points. 在兩個座標定義這些兩個控制點。The two coordinates in the defines those two control points. 描述關鍵 spline 貝茲曲線的開始點一律是 0，並結束點永遠為 1，這就是為什麼您只定義兩個控制點。When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points. 產生的曲線指定動畫如何插補期間的時間區段。也就是說，曲線代表時間區段中動畫的目標屬性變更的速率。The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment. 若要進一步了解貝茲曲線的動畫進度之間的關聯性，請參閱[金鑰曲線動畫範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values. 請注意，如果這些屬性包含資源的參考或資料繫結失敗時嘗試凍結物件，並將擲回。Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an . 這個方法會呼叫方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要建立目前物件的凍結的複本，請呼叫而不是直接呼叫這個方法。To create a frozen copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解如何運作方式，最好先了解三次方貝茲曲線。To understand how a works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves. 三次方貝茲曲線是由一個起始點、一個結束點和兩個控制點所定義。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points. 在兩個座標定義這些兩個控制點。The two coordinates in the defines those two control points. 描述關鍵 spline 貝茲曲線的開始點一律是 0，並結束點永遠為 1，這就是為什麼您只定義兩個控制點。When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points. 產生的曲線指定動畫如何插補期間的時間區段。也就是說，曲線代表時間區段中動畫的目標屬性變更的速率。The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment. 若要進一步了解貝茲曲線的動畫進度之間的關聯性，請參閱[金鑰曲線動畫範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).
